title: UL Research Links Tallness to Increased Risk of Premature Death on Dialysis (University of Limerick) ...
text: ( Source : University of Limerick ) 'We believe that nephrologists who care for tall patients should take this into consideration and ensure all patients are getting adequate dialysis.' - Professor Austin Stack Researchers from the Health
